casebody.data:
No. 13,

original.

Ex parte Heymann et al. Argued November 11, 12, 1937. Decided November 22, 1937. Mr. Walter E. Wiles, with whom Mr. John M. Lee was on the brief, for petitioners. Mr. Irving H. Flamm, with whom Mr. Meyer Abrams was on the brief, for respondents.

Certio-rari, post, p. 663, to the Circuit Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit.

Per Curiam:

After hearing argument the Court is of the opinion that it does not appear from the record that the Circuit Court of Appeals abused its discretion in refusing leave to appeal. The writ of certiorari is accordingly dismissed.
